TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Forest extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 类表示一个 Active Directory 域服务目录林。

span.span: The class represents an Active Directory Domain Services forest.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (string targetForestName, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword);

.method public hidebysig instance void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(string targetForestName, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword) cil managed
Public Sub CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (targetForestName As String, direction As TrustDirection, trustPassword As String)
public: void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(System::String ^ targetForestName, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::TrustDirection direction, System::String ^ trustPassword);

param.name: targetForestName
param.span: 用其创建信任关系的林的 DNS 名称。

span.span: The DNS name of the forest that the trust is created with.

param.name: direction
param.span: 其中一个 成员，该成员确定相对于此林的信任方向。

span.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.

param.name: trustPassword
param.span: 信任的密码。

span.span: The password for the trust.

summary.span: 使用指定的林创建信任关系的本地方。

span.span: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified forest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建信任关系的一侧。This method creates one side of a trust relationship. 在创建信任的双方之前，不建立了信任。The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created. `trustPassword`参数将密码与创建信任相关联。The `trustPassword` parameter associates a password with the created trust. 创建信任关系的另一端时，提供相同的密码，然后，两个本地信任绑定到每个其他。When the other side of the trust is created, the same password is provided and the two local trusts are then bound to each other. 若要在单个方法调用，以编程方式创建信任关系的双方，使用方法。To programmatically create both sides of a trust relationship in a single method call, use the method.

exception.span: 信任关系已存在。

span.span: The trust relationship already exists.

exception.span: 对基础目录服务的调用导致了错误。

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

exception.span: 目标服务器忙或不可用。

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

exception.span: 名称或 字符串为空。

span.span: name or string is empty.

exception.span: 或 为 。

span.span: or is .

exception.span: 不是有效的 值。

span.span: is not a valid value.

exception.span: 已释放此对象。

span.span: The object has been disposed.

exception.span: 指定的帐户没有权限执行此操作。

span.span: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection FindAllDiscoverableGlobalCatalogs() cil managed

summary.span: 在此林中查找所有可检测到的全局目录。

span.span: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest.

returns.span: 一个 ，它包含找到的全局目录的集合。

span.span: A that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以通过查询 DNS SRV 记录发现可发现域控制器。You can find discoverable domain controllers by querying DNS SRV records. 此方法返回仅注册通用，非特定于站点的 GC SRV 记录的全局目录。Only global catalogs that register a generic, non-site-specific, GC SRV record are returned by this method.

exception.span: 目标服务器忙或不可用。

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

exception.span: 已释放此对象。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection FindAllDiscoverableGlobalCatalogs(string siteName) cil managed
Public Function FindAllDiscoverableGlobalCatalogs (siteName As String) As GlobalCatalogCollection

param.name: siteName
param.span: 要搜索的站点的名称。

span.span: The name of the site to search.

summary.span: 在此林中查找位于指定站点中的所有可发现的全局目录。

span.span: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest in a specified site.

returns.span: 一个 ，它包含找到的全局目录的集合。

span.span: A that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以通过查询 DNS SRV 记录发现可发现的全局目录。You can find discoverable global catalogs by querying DNS SRV records. 如果全局编录未注册指定的站点的 GC SRV 记录，它将不会返回此方法，即使全局编录是以物理方式位于该站点内。If a global catalog does not register a GC SRV record for the specified site, it will not be returned by this method, even if the global catalog is physically located within that site. 即使它们不可能以物理方式位于该站点内，此方法，将返回所有全局目录注册指定的站点的 GC SRV 记录。All global catalogs which register a GC SRV record for the specified site will be returned by this method, even if they might not be physically located within that site.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool GetSelectiveAuthenticationStatus(string targetForestName) cil managed
Public Function GetSelectiveAuthenticationStatus (targetForestName As String) As Boolean

param.name: targetForestName
param.span: 与其存在入站信任关系的 的 DNS 名称。

span.span: The DNS name of the with which the inbound trust relationship exists.

summary.span: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示是否在与指定林的入站信任关系上启动选择性身份验证。

span.span: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether selective authentication is enabled on the inbound trust relationship with the specified forest.

summary.span: 如果启用选择性身份验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

returns.span: 如果启用选择性身份验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于林信任，如果你选择选择性身份验证，权限必须手动启用每个域和想在其他林中的用户才能访问本地林中的资源上。For a forest trust, if you opt for selective authentication, permissions must be manually enabled on each domain and resource in the local forest to which you want users in the other forest to have access. 当用户为其选择性情况下的身份验证信任关系启用身份验证，其他组织安全 ID (SID) 将添加到用户的授权数据。When a user authenticates across a trust for which selective authentication is enabled, an Other Organization security ID (SID) is added to the user's authorization data. 此 SID 将提示对资源域进行检查，以确保用户能够对特定服务进行身份验证。The presence of this SID prompts a check on the resource domain to ensure that the user is allowed to authenticate to the particular service. 用户进行身份验证后，用户进行身份验证的服务器将添加此组织 SID，如果其他组织 SID 尚不存在。After the user is authenticated, the server that authenticates the user adds the This Organization SID if the Other Organization SID is not already present. 在进行了身份验证的用户的上下文中，只能存在一个这样的特殊 SID。Only one of these special SIDs can be present in an authenticated user's context.

exception.span: 与 指定的 不存在信任关系。

span.span: There is no trust relationship with the that is specified by .

exception.span: 对 LsaQueryTrustedDomainInfoByName 的调用失败。

span.span: The call to LsaQueryTrustedDomainInfoByName failed.

exception.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library) 上 MSDN Library 中的主题 [LsaQueryTrustedDomainInfoByName](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/en-us/secmgmt/security/lsaquerytrusteddomaininfobyname.asp)。

span.span: For more information, see the topic [LsaQueryTrustedDomainInfoByName](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/en-us/secmgmt/security/lsaquerytrusteddomaininfobyname.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RaiseForestFunctionality(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestMode forestMode) cil managed

param.name: forestMode
param.span: 一个 枚举值，用于为目录林指定新的操作级别。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the forest.

summary.span: 为林提升操作模式。

span.span: Raises the mode of operation for the forest.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 值可以增大，但不能减小。The value can be raised but not lowered. 这意味着提升林功能级别是不可逆，并且应仔细做的决策后，若要这样做。This means that raising the functionality level of the forest is not reversible and the decision to do this should be made carefully. 有关目录林操作模式的详细信息，请参阅[域和林功能](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp)。For more information about forest operational modes, see [Domain and forest functionality](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp). 下表定义的有效值`forestMode`基于林的当前操作模式。The following table defines the valid values for `forestMode` based on the current operating mode of the forest. |当前模式Current mode|可以将模式提升到Mode can be raised to| |------------------|---------------------------| ||

| ||| ||无None|

exception.span: 对基础目录服务的调用导致了错误。

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

exception.span: 目标服务器忙或不可用。

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

exception.span: 根据该目录林的当前操作模式，为 指定的值无效。

span.span: Based on the current operating mode of the forest, the value specified for is not valid.

exception.span: 不是有效的 枚举值。

span.span: is not a valid enumeration value.

exception.span: 已释放此对象。

span.span: The object has been disposed.

exception.span: 指定的帐户没有权限执行此操作。

span.span: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

span.span: Raises the forest functionality level to the given setting.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetSidFilteringStatus (string targetForestName, bool enable);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetSidFilteringStatus(string targetForestName, bool enable) cil managed
Public Sub SetSidFilteringStatus (targetForestName As String, enable As Boolean)
public: void SetSidFilteringStatus(System::String ^ targetForestName, bool enable);

param.name: targetForestName
param.span: 与其存在信任关系的 对象的 DNS 名称。

span.span: The DNS name of the object with which the trust relationship exists.

param.name: enable
param.span: 如果要启用 SID 筛选，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if SID filtering is to be enabled; otherwise, .

summary.span: 对指定林设置 SID 筛选状态。

span.span: Sets the SID filtering state with the specified forest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，新的外部和林将同时信任[!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)]Active Directory 域服务加强 SID 筛选。By default, new external and forest trusts in [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)] Active Directory Domain Services enforce SID filtering. SID 筛选用于防止恶意用户可能会尝试授予到另一个用户帐户的提升的用户权限的攻击。SID filtering is used to prevent attacks from malicious users who might try to grant elevated user rights to another user account. 实施 SID 筛选在林信任上不会阻止迁移到同一林中的域从使用 SID 历史记录，并将不会影响你的通用组访问控制策略。Enforcing SID filtering on forest trusts does not prevent migrations to domains within the same forest from using SID history and will not affect your universal group access control strategy.

exception.span: 与 指定的目录林没有信任关系。

span.span: There is no trust relationship with the forest that is specified by .

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void VerifyTrustRelationship(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest targetForest, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction) cil managed
Public Sub VerifyTrustRelationship (targetForest As Forest, direction As TrustDirection)

param.name: targetForest
param.span: 要确认其信任关系的 对象。

span.span: A object for which to verify the trust relationship.

param.name: direction
param.span: 一个 值，该值指定相对于此目录林的信任方向。

span.span: A value that specifies the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.

summary.span: 确认以前建立的与指定林的信任是有效的。

span.span: Verifies that a previously established trust with the specified forest is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法验证已完全建立的信任关系。This method verifies that a trust relationship has been fully established. 在创建信任的双方之前，不建立了信任。The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.

exception.span: 与 指定的目录林没有信任关系，或者目标目录林没有 指定的信任方向。
